price: When the heaven is split asunder and becomes crimson like [burnt] oil[10].
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ
footnotes: [10] Or like tanned skin or molten brass.
